error.isAfterDay: The date should be after the {{date}}
error.isBeforeDay: The date should be before the {{date}}

main.subtitle: The management-tool by students for students
main.authors: by Joel, Florian, Mario and Vincent

add.title: Task added
add.message: The task has been successfully created

update.title: Task updated
update.message: The task has been saved successfully

deleteFailed.title: Task deletion failed
deleteFailed.message: An error occurred while deleting the ask. Please try again later

taskNotFound.title: Task not found
taskNotFound.message: We couldn't find the requested task

confirmDeleteDialog.title: Do you want to delete the Task?
confirmDeleteDialog.message: The task will be lost forever (A very long long time)

manage.assureDeletion: Do you really want to delete the object?

institution.confirmDeleteMessage: Do you really want to delete the institution? All child elements (schoolclasses, schoolyears, semesters, subjects) will be erased too.

notificationMessage.saveSuccess: The institution has been saved successfully.
notificationMessage.deleteSuccess: The institution has been deleted successfully.
notificationMessage.deleteFailed: A error occurred while deleting the institution. Please try again later

schoolClass.confirmDeleteMessage: Do you really want to delete the schoolclass? All child elements (schoolyears, semesters, subjects) will be erased too.

notificationMessage.saveSuccess: The schoolclass has been saved successfully.
notificationMessage.deleteSuccess: The schoolclass has been deleted successfully.
notificationMessage.deleteFailed: A error occurred while deleting the schoolclass. Please try again later

schoolYear.confirmDeleteMessage: Do you really want to delete the schoolyear? All child elements (semesters, subjects) will be erased too.

notificationMessage.saveSuccess: The schoolyear has been saved successfully.
notificationMessage.deleteSuccess: The schoolyear has been deleted successfully.
notificationMessage.deleteFailed: A error occurred while deleting the schoolyear. Please try again later

semester.confirmDeleteMessage: Do you really want to delete the semester? All child elements (subjects) will be erased too.

notificationMessage.saveSuccess: The semester has been saved successfully.
notificationMessage.deleteSuccess: The semester has been deleted successfully.

error.message: We could not log you in

0.title: Connection Error
0.message: The server is currently not reachable. Please try again later.

400.title: Data Error
400.message: The server is indicating invalid input data

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You are not allowed to perform this action

404.title: Not Found

500.title: Server Error
